reviewText: It was prophesised to Kans, the wicked king of Mathura, that the eigth child of his sister Devaki & her husband Vasudev, would be his nemesis. So killed seven of their children, but the eigth Child was born Krishna. Krishna - The pratham purush, the first & only principal that made this universe manifest & created humanity. Watch the episode of destruction of Kans by a mere stripling of a lad.
